column4: Hi! What do you use to scan and recognise a document? I heard about  Sane. But I need something wich is as Finereader
sane is the graphic part of the scanner.  you might see if that works first.  then you need a caracter recognition system (exuse my spelling)
Have you heard something like YaGF but for Gnome as one uses KDE libraries.
never heard of yagf but if you looking for ocr I see https://help.ubuntu.com/community/OCR
